EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Applicants when Funding Opportunity Unpublished
EmailTemplate.name: Funding Opportunity Unpublished
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Funding Opportunity {!Announcement__c.Name} Unpublished
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Funding Opportunity {!Announcement__c.Name} unpublished.
This email is to notify you that the following Funding Opportunity is unpublished
Funding Opportunity Details: Funding opportunity Number: {!Application__c.AnnouncementNumber__c} Funding Opportunity Title: {!Application__c.Announcement__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
